name: The Rebel
description: The Rebel is all about having fun and enjoying nice graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card with 1 GB dedicated video memory DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card with 2 GB dedicated video memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo sound card
